name: Advent of Ra (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
When you Tribute Summon "The Winged Dragon of Ra", its original ATK/DEF become the combined original ATK/DEF of the monsters Tributed for its Summon. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can activate 1 of these Skills:
● Reveal 1 "The Winged Dragon of Ra" monster in your hand, place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card.
● Once per Duel, you can discard 1 card, then add 1 "The Winged Dragon of Ra" monster from your Deck to your hand.
